AssociateServiceQuotaTemplate.name: AssociateServiceQuotaTemplate
AssociateServiceQuotaTemplate.description: Grants permission to associate the Service Quotas template with your organization

DeleteServiceQuotaIncreaseRequestFromTem.name: DeleteServiceQuotaIncreaseRequestFromTemplate
DeleteServiceQuotaIncreaseRequestFromTem.description: Grants permission to remove the specified service quota from the service quota template

DisassociateServiceQuotaTemplate.name: DisassociateServiceQuotaTemplate
DisassociateServiceQuotaTemplate.description: Grants permission to disassociate the Service Quotas template from your organization

GetAWSDefaultServiceQuota.name: GetAWSDefaultServiceQuota
GetAWSDefaultServiceQuota.description:
Grants permission to return the details for the specified service quota, including
                                                the AWS default value

GetAssociationForServiceQuotaTemplate.name: GetAssociationForServiceQuotaTemplate
GetAssociationForServiceQuotaTemplate.description:
Grants permission to retrieve the ServiceQuotaTemplateAssociationStatus value, which
                                                tells you if the Service Quotas template is associated with an organization

GetRequestedServiceQuotaChange.name: GetRequestedServiceQuotaChange
GetRequestedServiceQuotaChange.description:
Grants permission to retrieve the details for a particular service quota increase
                                                request

GetServiceQuota.name: GetServiceQuota
GetServiceQuota.description:
Grants permission to return the details for the specified service quota, including
                                                the applied value

GetServiceQuotaIncreaseRequestFromTempla.name: GetServiceQuotaIncreaseRequestFromTemplate
GetServiceQuotaIncreaseRequestFromTempla.description:
Grants permission to retrieve the details for a service quota increase request from
                                                the service quota template

ListAWSDefaultServiceQuotas.name: ListAWSDefaultServiceQuotas
ListAWSDefaultServiceQuotas.description: Grants permission to list all default service quotas for the specified AWS service

ListRequestedServiceQuotaChangeHistory.name: ListRequestedServiceQuotaChangeHistory
ListRequestedServiceQuotaChangeHistory.description: Grants permission to request a list of the changes to quotas for a service

ListRequestedServiceQuotaChangeHistoryBy.name: ListRequestedServiceQuotaChangeHistoryByQuota
ListRequestedServiceQuotaChangeHistoryBy.description: Grants permission to request a list of the changes to specific service quotas

ListServiceQuotaIncreaseRequestsInTempla.name: ListServiceQuotaIncreaseRequestsInTemplate
ListServiceQuotaIncreaseRequestsInTempla.description:
Grants permission to return a list of the service quota increase requests from the
                                                service quota template

ListServiceQuotas.name: ListServiceQuotas
ListServiceQuotas.description:
Grants permission to list all service quotas for the specified AWS service, in that
                                                account, in that Region

ListServices.name: ListServices
ListServices.description: Grants permission to list the AWS services available in Service Quotas

PutServiceQuotaIncreaseRequestIntoTempla.name: PutServiceQuotaIncreaseRequestIntoTemplate
PutServiceQuotaIncreaseRequestIntoTempla.description: Grants permission to define and add a quota to the service quota template

RequestServiceQuotaIncrease.name: RequestServiceQuotaIncrease
RequestServiceQuotaIncrease.description: Grants permission to submit the request for a service quota increase
